question: The Economic Survey 2017-18 has suggested six key areas that can be taken up as national missions to promote Indiaâ€™s R&D capabilities. Which one of the following is not the one among them?
option1: National Mission on Cyber Physical Systems
explanation: The Economic Survey 2017-18 has suggested six key areas that can be taken up as national missions. These are as follows: National Mission on Cyber-Physical Systems; national missions on dark matter; genomics; energy storage systems; mathematics and agriculture. National Mission on Food Processing was launched in 2012 for the 12<sup>th</sup> five-year plan.
